feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't show hidden settings in the settings bar by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14022
  • Upgrade to Typescript 5.5.2 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14007
  • Fixing pro submodule check (no merge issue) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14027
  • Update OpenAI dependency to fix 400 errors by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14033
  • Remove DD CI visibility by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13961
  • Table UI changes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13965
  • Bringing back backend column validation by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14026
  • Fix missing operator options when filtering on relationships by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14006
  • Fix weird behaviour when adding rows if you have multiple pages of data by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14044
  • Frontend - allow prohibited columns, case sensitive by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14045

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.3...2.29.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Replace multiple spaces in bindings with one space by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14018
  • Added button options text to the prompt user action. by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14031
  • Fixing a date JS test case by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14062
  • Fix contains search on multi-user column. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14059

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.4...2.29.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add verify_sso_login flow by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14060
  • Initial implementation of solving SQS issue with case insensitivity by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14038
  • BUDI-8312 -Bindings Menu shows behind the Add Test Data menu in automations by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13828
  • Updating filter fields to use relationship name rather than related table name by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14063
  • Fix NX hiding test failures by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14068
  • Update CouchDB Dockerfile to be SQS capable by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14070
  • Make the SQS environment check work off the SQS_SEARCH_ENABLE env var. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14073
  • Handle view visibility schema by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14072

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.5...2.29.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • App migration queue created consistently by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14076
  • Set DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE on build by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14078

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.6...2.29.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update MongoDB. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14082
  • Fix an issue where null values were causing an error in automation loops by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14083

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.7...2.29.8
